Title: Ghost Stories
Writer: Jeremy Dyson, Andy Nyman, Jeremy Dyson (stage play), Andy Nyman (stage play)
Actors: Andy Nyman, Martin Freeman, Paul Whitehouse, Alex Lawther
Plot: Skeptical professor Phillip Goodman embarks on a trip to the terrifying after being given a file with details of three unexplained cases of apparitions.
Production: IFC Films, Warp Films, Lionsgate, Altitude Film Entertainment
